sen.j: 京極 高美（きょうごく たかよし、文化 (元号)15年4月12日 (旧暦)（1818年5月16日）- 弘化2年7月16日 (旧暦)（1845年8月18日））は、讃岐国丸亀藩の世嗣。
sen.e: Takayoshi KYOGOKU (born on May 16, 1818 and died on August 18, 1845) was an heir to Marugame domain of the Province of Sanuki.
Takayoshi KYOGOKU (May 16, 1818 - August 18, 1845) was an heir to Marugame Domain of Sanuki Province.
sen.cmt: 生没年の表記を訂正しました。Marugame Domain of Sanuki Provinceに訂正しました。
sen.e: Takayoshi KYOGOKU (May 16, 1818 - August 18, 1845) was an heir to Marugame Domain of Sanuki Province.

sen.j: 第6代藩主・京極高朗の長男。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of the sixth lord, Takaaki KYOGOKU.
sen.cmt: 「京極高朗」の読み方が確認できていません。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of the sixth lord, Takaakira KYOGOKU.
sen.cmt: 京極高朗→Takaakira KYOGOKUに訂正しました。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of the sixth lord, Takaakira KYOGOKU.

sen.j: 正室は浅野長懋（浅野重晟四男）の娘。
sen.e: His legal wife was a daughter of Nagayasu ASANO (Shigeaki ASANO's fourth son).
sen.cmt: 「浅野長懋」「浅野重晟」の読み方が確認できていません。
sen.e: His legal wife was a daughter of Nagamasa ASANO (Shigeakira ASANO's fourth son).
sen.cmt: 浅野長懋→Nagamasa ASANO浅野重晟→Shigeakira ASANO に訂正しました。
sen.e: His legal wife was a daughter of Nagamasa ASANO (Shigeakira ASANO's fourth son).

sen.j: 丸亀藩嫡子として生まれるが、家督相続以前の弘化2年（1845年）に28歳で早世した。
sen.e: Although Takayoshi was born as the heir to Marugame domain, he died early at the age of 28, before he inherited the family estate.
Although Takayoshi was born as the heir to Marugame Domain, he died early at the age of 28 (1845), before he inherited the family estate.
sen.cmt: Domain 大文字にしました。(1845)補足しました。
sen.e: Although Takayoshi was born as the heir to Marugame Domain, he died early at the age of 28 (1845), before he inherited the family estate.

sen.j: 代わって、京極朗徹が父・高朗の婿養子に迎えられ、嫡子となった。
sen.e: Instead of Takayoshi, Akitetsu KYOGOKU was adopted as the husband for a daughter of Takaai and became the heir.
sen.cmt: 「京極朗徹」の読み方が確認できていません。
sen.e: Instead of Takayoshi, Akiyuki KYOGOKU was adopted as the husband for a daughter of Takaaira and became the heir.
sen.cmt: 京極朗徹→Akiyuki KYOGOKU [http://kotobank.jp/word/%E4%BA%AC%E6%A5%B5%E6%9C%97%E5%BE%B9] Takaairaに訂正しました。
sen.e: Instead of Takayoshi, Akiyuki KYOGOKU was adopted as the husband for a daughter of Takaaira and became the heir.
